item.title: Fed Governor Waller sees more rate cuts but says central bank needs to be 'cautious about it'
item.description: Waller continues to support lowering rates but said the central bank needs to be careful amid conflicting economic signals.

item.title: Morgan Stanley drops restrictions on which wealth clients can own crypto funds
item.description: Morgan Stanley's move marks the latest expansion of access to crypto at the world's largest wealth management firm.

item.title: Trump's Fed chair candidates list narrowed down to five by Bessent after interviews, sources say
item.description: The Treasury plans to hold another round of interviews with all five candidates in the coming weeks and months.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Applied Digital, Mosaic Levi Strauss & more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves before the bell.

item.title: China retaliates against U.S. port fees with new charges on American ships
item.description: The move comes a day after China ramped up restrictions on rare earths exports amid ongoing tensions with the U.S.
